statements: DELETE FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level < 5 AND drug_target = TRUE;
DELETE FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_id = 100 AND expression_level > 50.0
DELETE FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE drug_target = TRUE
DELETE FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = 1 AND drug_name = 'Paracetamol';
DELETE FROM gene_expression WHERE gene_name='TP53' AND expression_level < 0.5;
DELETE FROM drug_targets WHERE target_name = 'Protein X';
DELETE FROM gene_drug_relationship WHERE gene_id = 2 AND drug_id = 5;
DELETE FROM gene_drug_relationship WHERE gene_id = 201 AND drug_id = 301;
